Treatment may include the following:         -  Surgery (wide local excision and removal of lymph nodes in the groin).    -  Radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before or after surgery.    - A clinical trial of new drugs, biologic therapy, or new kinds of surgery.
